Package hk.edu.ouhk.lib.acq

Class FetchReportBySchoolAndDates

java.lang.Object
hk.edu.ouhk.lib.acq.FetchReportBySchoolAndDates
public class FetchReportBySchoolAndDates
extends java.lang.Object
OUHK In-house Library Tool - Fetch new arrival title report by School and date range from ARC and Aleph Oracle tables.
Since:
27 Mar 2019
Version:
1.0
Author:
Wai-yan NG, wwyng@ouhk.edu.hk

  • Constructor Details

    • FetchReportBySchoolAndDates

      public FetchReportBySchoolAndDates​(java.lang.String schCode, java.lang.String writePath, java.io.Writer wr)
      Preparing for reports; you may run reportThisMonth() or reportLastMonth() right after this.
      Parameters:
      schCode - The School code of a particular school, defined in the file 1st column in the form [schCode@School Name] in budgetCode.txt under the class folder hk.edu.ouhk.lib.acq.
      writePath - The full folder path to store the generated Excel report; be sure the program has writing privilege of the path.
      wr - For writing the report in HTML format out to an IO, normally used by JSP the istance javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter.

    • FetchReportBySchoolAndDates

      public FetchReportBySchoolAndDates​(java.lang.String schCode, java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate, java.lang.String writePath, java.io.Writer wr)
      Prepare for report; fetchReport() can be called right after this.
      Parameters:
      schCode - The School code of a particular school, defined in the file 1st column in the form [schCode@School Name] in budgetCodeConfig.txt.
      startDate - In the format YYYYMMDD, as the starting date range of the report.
      endDate - In the format YYYYMMDD, as the ending date range of the report.
      writePath - The full folder path to store the generated Excel report; be sure the program has writing privilege of the path.
      wr - For writing the report in HTML format out to an IO, normally used by JSP the instance javax.servlet.jsp.JspWriter.

  • Method Details

    • setWriter

      public void setWriter​(java.io.Writer wr)
      Set the report Writer class; the report is in HTML format.
      Parameters:
      wr - A Writer class for writing out the HTML report.

    • setWritePath

      public void setWritePath​(java.lang.String writePath)
      Set the writePath
      Parameters:
      writePath - writePath is the path to write the Excel report. The running of this program must have relevant writing privilege of the path.

    • setSchCode

      public void setSchCode​(java.lang.String schCode)
      Set the schCode
      Parameters:
      schCode - schCode is the key relating to the budget codes, that each school holds certain budgets, for report generation. The schCode is defined in the configuration file "budgetCodes.txt" of this program.

    • setStartDate

      public void setStartDate​(java.lang.String startDate)
      Set the startDate
      Parameters:
      startDate - startDate is the starting date range of the target report.

    • setEndDate

      public void setEndDate​(java.lang.String endDate)
      Set the endDate
      Parameters:
      endDate - endDate is the ending date range of the target report.

    • getReportFiles

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getReportFiles()
      Return the files name of the generated reports.
      Returns:
      The report file names; should have only one in the array list.

    • reportThisMonth

      public void reportThisMonth()
      Using the current set school code and generate the associated report of the current month

    • reportLastMonth

      public void reportLastMonth()
      Using the current set school code and generate the associated report of the last month

    • fetchReport

      public void fetchReport()
      Using the current set schCode, startDate, endDate, and report path; and generate the associated report.
